The alcohol limit for drivers aged 20 and over lowers from 400mcg of alcohol per litre of breath to 250mcg, from 01/12/14. 12 November 2014 NEWS Hawke's Bay Today Photograph by Duncan Brown. HBG 02Dec14 - WATCH AS YOU GO: The new drink-drive limit was introduced this week. HBG 13Dec14 - NAG 13Dec14 - RGP 05Jan15 - SUN 10Jan16 - WAG 18Jan16 - NABBED: A false name has caught up with a woman trying to avoid a conviction. Photo / NZME RGP 30Sep20 - Police are urging people to drive responsibly. INSET: Inspector Brent Crowe, road policing manager for the Bay of Plenty. Photos / File NAG 22Mar21 - Northland police checkpoints around Whangarei successfully removed more than 30 drink-drivers from the region's roads. Photo / File NAG 22Mar21 - Police catch 32 drink-drivers over weekend - P4 WGP 18Jun21 - The arrest followed a driver attempting to avoid a checkpoint.Photo / Duncan Brown
